revision.comment: [[User:Addbot|Bot:]] Migrating 2 interwiki links, now provided by [[Wikipedia:Wikidata|Wikidata]] on [[d:q10973625]]

{{Navbox | name = Oracle | state = {{{state<includeonly>|collapsed</includeonly>}}} | image = | title = [[Oracle Corporation]] | bodyclass = hlist
| group1 = [[Corporation|Corporate]] [[Board of directors|directors]] | list1 = *[[Jeffrey Berg]] *[[H. Raymond Bingham]] *[[Michael Boskin]] *[[Safra A. Catz]] *[[Larry Ellison]] *[[Héctor García-Molina]] *[[Joseph Grundfest]] *[[Jeffrey O. Henley]] *[[Mark Hurd]] *[[Jack Kemp|Jack F. Kemp]] *[[Donald L. Lucas]] *[[Naomi O. Seligman]]
| group2 = [[Mergers and acquisitions|Acquisitions]] ([[List of acquisitions by Oracle|list]]) | list2 = *[[Sun Microsystems|Sun]] *[[PeopleSoft]] *[[Hyperion Solutions|Hyperion]] *[[Siebel Systems|Siebel]] *[[BEA Systems|BEA]] *[[JD Edwards]] *[[RightNow Technologies|RightNow]] *[[Virtual Iron]] *[[Timesten]] *[[Retek]] *[[Sunopsis]]

| group4 = [[Programming language]]s | list4 = *[[Java (programming language)|Java]] *[[PL/SQL]]
| group5 = [[Integrated development environment|IDE]] | list5 = *[[JDeveloper]] *[[Oracle Forms|Forms]] *[[NetBeans]] *[[Oracle Application Express|Apex]] *[[Oracle SQL Developer|SQL Developer]] *[[Sun Studio (software)|Solaris Studio]]
| group6 = [[Middleware (distributed applications)|Middleware]] | list6 = *[[WebLogic]] *[[Oracle Coherence|Coherence]] *[[Tuxedo (software)|Tuxedo]] *[[GlassFish]]
| group7 = [[Operating system]]s | list7 = *[[Oracle Linux]] *[[Solaris (operating system)|Oracle Solaris]]
| group8 = [[Computer hardware]] | list8 = *[[Sun Fire]] *[[SPARC]] *[[StorageTek]]
| group9 = [[Computer appliance]]s | list9 = *[[Oracle Exadata]] *[[Oracle Exalogic]] *[[Oracle Exalytics]] *[[Oracle Big Data Appliance|Big Data Appliance]]
| group10 = Education and recognition | list10 = *[[Oracle Certification Program]]
| below = {{CTT | icon = | revenue = $37.12 billion [[United States dollar|USD]] | revenue_year = 2012 | staff = 117,229 | staff_year = | stock_symbol = ORCL | website = [http://www.oracle.com/ www.oracle.com] }} *{{icon|category}} '''[[:Category:Oracle Corporation|Category]]''' *[[File:Commons-logo.svg|16x16px|link=|alt=]] [[commons:Category:Oracle Corporation|'''Commons''']]
